name: hrscraper
title: HRSCRAPER Actor
description: Comprehensive scraper for HR-related datasets with enrichment and API output capabilities.

input.title: HRSCRAPER Input
input.description: Parameters for a minimal HTML scrape. Set dryRun=false to fetch pages.

dryRun.title: Dry run
dryRun.description: If true, skip network calls and just echo inputs.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Pages to fetch and parse when dryRun=false.

selectors.title: CSS Selectors (optional)
selectors.description: CSS selectors to extract innerText from (e.g., ['h1', '.job-title']).
